#id=1
#text=Yesterday I wanted to ride my bicycle to my friends house .
#id=2
#text=The weather was nice and I had n't used my bicycle in a while .
#id=3
#text=When I got to my garage I realized that I had a front flat tire .
#id=4
#text=First I checked if there were any holes in my tire but there were n't .
#id=5
#text=That was good because it meant that the tire only needed more air .
#id=6
#text=I then went looking for the air pump .
#id=7
#text=I found it on one of the shelves .
#id=8
#text=I took the cap off the tire valve .
#id=9
#text=I put the pump onto the tire valve and began pumping in air .
#text=After a few seconds I grabbed the tire to see how much more air was needed .
#text=I did this until I had pumped it up enough .
#text=I then took the pump off the valve and put the cap back onto the valve .
#text=I put the pump back where I found it and got on my bicycle .
#text=I cycled to my friends house and we had a fun time .
